mapper.select: select ip.insured_person_id, ip.insured_person_name_kanji, ip.insured_person_name_kana, ip.insured_person_birth_date, ip.insured_person_sex, c.contract_id, c.contract_start_date, c.contract_end_date from insured_persons as ip inner join contracts as c on ip.insured_person_id = c.insured_person_id and ip.insured_person_id = #{insured_person_id} and c.security_type = 'TC'

select ip.insured_person_id, ip.insured_person_name_kanji, ip.insured_person_name_kana, ip.insured_person_birth_date, ip.insured_person_sex, ip.update_at as ip_update_at, c.contract_id, c.contract_history_id, c.contract_start_date, c.contract_end_date, c.contract_end_reason, c.contract_maturity_date, c.security_type, c.entry_age, c.payment_method, c.insurance_money, c.premium, c.premium_payment_term, c.contract_term, c.payment_expiration_age, c.update_at as c_update_at, p.payment_control_id, p.payment_amount, p.update_at as p_update_at from insured_persons as ip inner join contracts as c on ip.insured_person_id = c.insured_person_id and ip.insured_person_id = #{insured_person_id} and c.contract_id = #{contract_id} left join payment_idx as pi on ip.insured_person_id = pi.insured_person_id and c.contract_id = pi.contract_id left join payment as p on pi.payment_control_id = p.payment_control_id
